name: Space Pirates
overview: Space Pirates is an arcade action game written in Basic and published in 64'er 1993/07, a German C64 magazine 64'er as a type-in game. You're controlling a space ship in a middle of a mine field and your job is to avoid touching anything on screen. One curious choice in game design is the reversed controls; as the ship is traveling downwards, pulling your joystick left takes the ship right and vice versa.
